name: Mag&Gun
description:
This game was created for week 134 of weekly game jam

For this game jam i tried procedural generation, i never really made anything with procedural generation so i learned a bit about it, but it needs a bit of optimization.

I also wanted to try making it a browser game but i couldn't get it to work with WebGL and it's alerdy a late entry, maybe i will add it later.

Mag&Gun is a fast-paced endless side scroller that features A LOT of shooting

Game features a lot of shooting but not a lot of guns, well for now but i am planning on adding more guns and other features in the future

All sprites, scripts and sound effects were created by me but music wasn't

it was created by following creators

  • February by Vibe Mountain
  • Juno In The Space Maze by loopop
